traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the zombie can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Undead fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zombie makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (ld6 +4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (ld4 +4) slashing damage.
